title: New soccer font
content:
I need to ID this font, can somebody help me, please?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228172203im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Letras%202006-2007_4297.jpg)
author: galadriel2025

comments.content:
It's not identical, but the [House Chalet 70 London](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228172203/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts) style replicates almost all of these letterforms except the M. This Adidas lettering is probably custom lettering. (I'm surprised it took this long for requests for World Cup soccer shirt lettering fonts -- or else I missed the earlier requests.)

- Mike Yanega

It has an [Industria](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228172203/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.120915.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=74&sampleText=BECKHAM&sampleSize=96)ness about it too.

fwiw these are Real Madrid shirts rather than national shirts, still probably custom though.  
Tim
